OOC: I wasn't mocking you, I just wanted to make sure you read the post.
ALso, I already asked Robo Rick about it, and he said that after you
blew me away with the water, then you guys followed, and we were far
enough away from the base then. Plus, Dcoburn and Azurblade both posted.

BIC:

Spasstik only stood on Groove for a few seconds, before leaping towards
Rumble, leaving Groove an open target for Blade's assault. As Spasstik
leapt towards him, Rumble pushed his dented frame, into the air, and
compacted transforming into cassette mode. Soundwave's door opened, and
received the cassette. Spasstik then began to bound away from the danger
area, to bring his comerades with him (Soundwave still in his mouth),
starting to head away from the base.
